subject: Baseball
Transplants
lead_paragraph: When Brett Gardner met Alyssa Esposito, an 18-year-old waiting for a heart transplant, she asked him he would hit a home run that night. Hours later, her prediction came true.
snippet: When Brett Gardner met Alyssa Esposito, an 18-year-old waiting for a heart transplant, she asked him he would hit a home run that night. Hours later, her prediction came true.
